knimeNode.name: Extract From To
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts data from Timestamp1 to Timestamp2 from input table.

fullDescription.intro: Extracts from input table a sub-table with data between TimeStamp1 and Timestamp2.
fullDescription.option: Select the input column containing timestamp cells.
First Timestamp boundary of the extraction interval.
Second Timestamp boundary of the extraction interval.

ports.dataOut: Sub-Table containing only data between "From: Timestamp" and "To: Timestamp".
